name: Reditus
storyline: Reditus is a profound story of a father and son who struggle with their existential meaning in life after the religion they cling to wreaked havoc on their world. The journey they set out on to find truth in this struggle will once again unleash apocalyptic consequences on the world they live in as outcasts.
summary:
Augustus knows he must go to the heart of the Heremus to the place his god hid his face from the world.
But is it worth the Cost?
Will he trade his soul to become the Reditus?

Reditus blends the old with the new by bringing classic RPG scifi pixel art like Final Fantasy 6 with updated 3d graphics.
